import React,{useState}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{useInView}from'react-intersection-observer';import toast from'react-hot-toast';import{useTranslations}from'../utils/translations';import{VALIDATION_PATTERNS,ERROR_MESSAGES}from'../utils/constants';import{apiService}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactSection=_ref=>{let{currentLanguage,preFilledEstimate}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslations(currentLanguage);const[ref,inView]=useInView({threshold:0.1,triggerOnce:true});const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',phone:'',email:'',message:'',sms_consent:false});const[errors,setErrors]=useState({});const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);// Update message when preFilledEstimate changes
